import{MenuItemType,EventType}from'@datadog/ui-extensions-sdk';export var setupWidgetCtxMenu=function setupWidgetCtxMenu(client){// provide widget context menu items dynamically
client.widgetContextMenu.onRequest(function(_ref){var widget=_ref.widget;return{items:[{href:"https://docs.datadoghq.com/dashboards/widgets/".concat(widget.definition.type,"/"),actionType:MenuItemType.LINK,key:'link-item',label:"Read about ".concat(widget.definition.type," widgets"),order:3},{actionType:MenuItemType.EVENT,// this key is used below to determine which action to take upon click
key:'sidepanel-trigger',label:"Open a sidepanel",order:1}]};});// listen for ctx menu click events
